directions: [["In a large bowl combine all ingredients. "],["Heat a frying pan and a couple teaspoon olive oil over medium-low heat. Mixture will be slightly stick, so using a measuring cup, drop mixture into pan ad lightly flatten to .5 in thick."],["Fry until golden-brown, about 4 minutes on each side."],[" "],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""]]
notes:
These burgers can be baked in the oven versus frying. 
To cook quinoa use 1 cup uncooked quinoa, 2 cups water, .5 teaspoon salt. In a medium saucepan bring the 2 cups water and .5 teaspoon salt to a boil over high heat. Add quinoa and reduce heat to low. Cover and cook for 18-20 minutes, or until all water is absorbed and the seeds are tender.
